object.name: candlestick
object.description: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

extra_description.description:
It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter.  Its
candles are a yellowish white colour.

object.name: tickler
object.description: A nightgaunt's tickler has been left here.

extra_description.description:
A horrid black mass of gooey tentacles obviously ripped from the corpse
of a nightgaunt ... disgusting.

object.name: plasma webbing
object.description: A pile of pink material is lying here

extra_description.description: Yuck, mossy and wet.  It looks like some sort of webbing.

object.name: rod key
object.description: A queerly shaped rod is lying here.

extra_description.description:
This rod looks sort of octagonal, and sort of like a key and crowbar.  You
recognize that it will probably fit the lock at the entrance of the tombs.

object.name: large black dirty key
object.description: A large black dirty key is lying here

extra_description.description:
One of those traditional old lock type keys ... except huge, black and
filthy ... hmm ... like it has been buried for some time ...

object.name: head jubal mummy
object.short_descr: the mummified head of Jubal the Benevolent
object.description: The mummified head of Jubal the Benevolent is lolling back and forth.

extra_description.description:
ACK! It's half eaten away ... yet it is whole ... in fact I think it can be
opened and closed ... is there something in its teeth!?!?!? ACK you do it!

object.name: ring black marble
object.description: A black marble ring is lying here on the ground.

extra_description.description:
It is pitch black and has beautiful swirls characteristic of marble all
through it.

object.name: rapier thin
object.description: A rapier is lying here.

extra_description.description: It seems so thin that it would be useless but at the same time it looks deadly.

object.name: sarcophagus coffin
object.description: A stone sarcophagus is sitting here.

extra_description.description:
A well crafted, if dusty and ancient, home for the afterworld, it seems
to be able to be opened but needs a key.

object.name: iron heavy key
object.description: A heavy iron key is lying here.

extra_description.description: It looks to be a very heavy old iron key.

object.name: flask wineflask
object.description: A wineflask has been been left here.

extra_description.description:
A nice leather wineflask that has somehow survived the ages in a coffin.
The wine should be nicely aged.

object.name: coins
object.short_descr: a mound of coins fit for a dead king
object.description: You see a mound of coins fit for a dead king here

object.name: key
object.description: The key to the coffin is lying here

extra_description.description:
Neat you have the key to the coffin...is is a soft orange color
and burns in your hand a bit.

object.name: rathcor
object.short_descr: a hidden compartment in the room

extra_description.description: Ah HA!  A hidden compartment!

object.name: rusty sword curved scimitar
object.description: A sword has been left lying here

extra_description.description:
Very rusty and old...it has a wide blade and chunks missing from
its cutting edge.

object.name: piece slime
object.description: You step on a piece of slime...your foot squishes a bit

extra_description.description:
ICK! This is a piece of slug-like brownish green slime...
Blech!

object.name: smock
object.description: An artist's smock is lying here on the floor.

extra_description.description:
It has paint and little shavings of different materials all over it.
It is very old an smells of paint, mildew, and rot.

object.name: scroll tightly rolled
object.description: A yellowing tightly rolled scroll is here

extra_description.description:
It is tightly wound. The writing on the inside when opened up is very
unreadable but the scroll has a seal on it with a grey :

    88
    88
8888  8888
    88
    88

object.name: auburn orb
object.description: An orb is here

extra_description.description:
You gaze into the orb and are almost lost in the swirling mists of color
inside of this rare and beautiful object.

object.name: bar gold
object.description: A bar of gold is lying here

extra_description.description:
A nice little brick of gold...very dusty and old... it has some emblem
on it...The emblem is a large 'J'

object.name: cape dark black
object.description: A dark black cape is lying here

extra_description.description:
The cape is gently flows and pulls in the light so evenly and perfectly
that the cape seems to be simply a void of blackness. It is quite beautiful

object.name: flaming black sword long longsword
object.description: A pitch-black long swor here

extra_description.description:
This sword is amazing! It almost wields itself! As you test it out, the
flames seems to roar brighter as you go thru basic swordsman routines.
it is obviously a great find!

object.name: breast plate dented worn
object.short_descr: a worn and dented breast plate
object.description: A piece of armour is here.

extra_description.description: Though this piece of armour is worn and dented it looks very usable.

object.name: key silver
object.description: You see a silver key here.

extra_description.description: for the altar...
